mapper.select: SELECT board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM board WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt, reg_date FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt, reg_date FROM board WHERE
title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
writer LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
(title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND
rownum <= #{page} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_no, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
INSERT INTO file_upload (file_path, board_no) VALUES (#{filePath}, seq_board.currval)
